error.confused: I'm confused, please try the `{prefix}help` command or ask the admins for help.
error.somethingWrong: Something went wrong, please let the admins know.
error.noPermission:
wowowow you don't have permission to do that!
You probably made a mistake, try the `{prefix}help` command.
error.roleLimit: you already have too many roles. Please remove some before adding more.
error.seehelp: I don't understand. Type `{prefix}help {0}` to see how to use that command.

help.noInfo: I don't have any info about that. Try `{prefix}help`
help.invalidFormat: please give me a year from 1 to 3, e.g. `{prefix}help cl 2`.

course.added: I gave you the role{0} for **{1}**
course.noMatches:
there are no matches for `{0}`.
See `{prefix}help courselist`.
course.twoMatches:
there are two matches for `{0}`.
Use a full name or code instead:
• `{1}` / `{2}`
• `{3}` / `{4}`
course.tooManyMatches:
there were too many matches for `{0}`.
Try using a course's name or code instead.
course.allCoursesAccessAdded: Ok nerd. I gave you access to channels for all courses in the Bachelor.
course.allCoursesAccessRemoved: you won't have access to all course channels anymore.
course.invalidFormat:
please use a course name, code or acronym. For example: `{prefix}c oop`,
or see `{prefix}help course` or `{prefix}help course`.
course.invalidRemoveFormat:
please give me a course name, code or acronym. For example: `{prefix}c -r oop`,
or see `{prefix}help course` or `{prefix}help courselist`.

year.added: I gave you the role for **year {0}**.
year.invalidFormat:
please give me a year from 1 to 3, e.g. `{prefix}y 1`,
or see `{prefix}help year`.

variant.added:
I gave you the **{0}** variant role.
You can now access channels for the {0} variant.
variant.addedAll: Ok nerd. I gave you access to all variant course channels.
variant.removed: I removed your role for **{0}** variant courses.
variant.removedAll: I removed your access to all variant course channels.
variant.removedAllAccess: I removed your role for accessing all variants. You might still have other variant roles left.
variant.userHasNoVariant: you don't have any specific variant role. You can choose one so others know what you're studying.

honours.accessGranted: I gave you access the honours programme channel.
honours.accessRemoved: I removed your access to the honours programme channel.

invite.link:
here's a temporary invite link: {0}
It's limited to {1} uses, but I can make more links.
invite.askedPolitely: Since you asked nicely, it will last twice as long ({0}) with {1} uses.
invite.cannotCreate: I couldn't make an invite link!

country.invalidCountry: I don't know what country you mean by that.
country.invalidFormat:
please give me a country name or code,
or see `{prefix}help country`.
country.assigned: I gave you the country role for **{0}** {1}
country.removed: I removed that country from your account.
country.removedAll: I removed all your country roles.

ta.accessGranted: I gave you the TA role. Nice to have another TA onboard!
